description: Display information about the internals of coverage.py, for diagnosing problems. Topics are: 'data' to show a summary of the collected data; 'sys' to show installation information; 'config' to show the configuration; 'premain' to show what is calling coverage; 'pybehave' to show internal flags describing Python behavior.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The topic to debug. One of: 'data', 'sys', 'config', 'premain', 'pybehave'.
